name: Horror game (Lliakos)
description: This is my first project/game that i made. I used a tutorial for the map and some of the scripts but other than that, i am very proud of how it turned out and i hope you will like what i made in my spare time this summer :).  I just made it to test my 3d game skills and yea thats that. Also I have no idea what to name this so i just named it Horror Game. Any ideas?
